Package bio.singa.structure.model.mmtf

Class MmtfLeafSubstructure<FamilyType extends StructuralFamily>

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.structure.model.mmtf.MmtfLeafSubstructure<FamilyType>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AtomContainer, LeafSubstructure<FamilyType>, Exchangeable<FamilyType>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MmtfAminoAcid, MmtfLigand, MmtfNucleotide
    public abstract class MmtfLeafSubstructure<FamilyType extends StructuralFamily>
extends java.lang.Object
implements LeafSubstructure<FamilyType>
    The implementation of LeafSubstructure for mmtf structures. Remembers the internal group index, the leaf identifier and the indices of the first and the last atom belonging to this group.
